description: This file defines the API route handlers for user-related operations in a FastAPI backend, including retrieving the current user's profile, updating it, and listing users (admin functionality).

methods.name: get_me(user: UserInDB = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's public profile.

methods.name: update_me(payload: UserUpdate, user: UserInDB = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates the current authenticated user's profile fields.

methods.name: list_users( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search term for email or name"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin)), )
methods.description: Lists users with optional search by email or name; accessible by admin users.

ctags.name: list_users
ctags.signature: ( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search term for email or name"), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), _: UserInDB = Depends(require_roles(Role.admin)), )

ctags.name: update_me
ctags.pattern: /^async def update_me(payload: UserUpdate, user: UserInDB = Depends(get_current_user)):$/
